name: 高等數學物理
goals: 認識高等數學與理論物理之間的關聯，以及前者對後者之應用。
熟悉圖解法之威力與妙用。
syllabus:
This course will be given in English this year.

It is to provide a review of the technique necessary for starting a research in particle physics.

A familiarity with Quantum Field Theory is required. 

The topics we will cover consist of:

1\. Gauge field theory 

2\. Spontaneously Broken Symmetry

3\. Higgs Mechanism

4\. Standard Model

5\. Neutrino Masses

6\. Dark Matter

7\. Extra Dimension

8\. Supersymmetry
